protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the O-methylation, and thereby the inactivation, of catecholamine neurotransmitters and catechol hormones. Also shortens the biological half-lives of certain neuroactive drugs, like L-DOPA, alpha-methyl DOPA and isoproterenol.

go_class.description: cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
cellular amino acid derivative metabolic process
negative regulation of dopamine metabolic process
negative regulation of smooth muscle cell proliferation
positive regulation of homocysteine metabolic process
